title: OK, can we nerf Garen now?
body:
Whilst I LOVE playing him, he is too easy to win with. 36 minutes in I was a few gold short of my full build which would have put me just short of 5K health.

With what I had I was like 4.5K health or something, with Warmog sitting out of combat I was pulling almost +250 health PER SECOND. 4 seconds out of combat for his passive to give me +108 HP/s, 4 more seconds for +250 HP/s.

Once you have your full build you just hit Q if you are in trouble and wait around for 10 seconds or so and you should be close to, or at full health.

On top of that with my one lousy +40 AD item, I was at 200+ AD total and hitting like a truck. I now have enough games in the last 1-2 weeks that I am level 3 already and pulling S ranked games even if I start bad.

What's the deal? Why so OP?

replies.body:
yea


revert the changes and bring old garen back( and old zzrot too)
Garen can easily lose to Riven; I'll give you that.
I beat a Riven easier than I do some others.

If by OP you mean 1 dimensional and easy enough to shut down, yeah.

Annie is the same type of "OP" but worse, because she is more viable.
So far as Garen I have yet to have a game that was hard, yeh some of them started harder than others, but overall even if my team is sucking ass, I have a good fun game.

He's just been redone, wait a week or so then people will figure it out. Everyone has a weakness, you find it and you win.

Take Morde, even before rework he was epic **but** you need to take them out real fast or else they can just stroll away from you. Luckily nobody notices that haha.
